One of the best remapping tools I've used, and my personal favorite. Shizuku compatible and easily integrated with Tasker via shortcuts and intents. Ordinarily, I'd rate ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÜ for an app like this, because I reserve 5 star ratings for apps which I have no complaints about. Key Mapper gets 5 from me because, despite all the excellent features, it's 100% free. REALLY free. No restrictions or limitations you have to pay to get rid of, no ads and, most importantly, absolutely no data collected. üèÜ

Good app, but have found an annoying fault. If I remap my Volume buttons both up or down to toggle sound options or mute options with a double tap, I cannot hold down the buttons to increase or decrease volume. This is vital as losing the double tap means it's essential to hold down volume to quickly change the settings, otherwise you slowly have to keep tapping to get the desired volume level. Please fix.
